title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.9 - Determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.9 - Determination

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements of section
8187-1.13
of this Part, in making its determination, the State Board shall determine what
deductions or additions ought to be made from or to the aggregate corrected
value of the real property of each tax district within the county as
established by the county legislative body, commissioners of equalization or
county tax commission for equalization purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8187-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
